info.title: System Layout Loader and Manager
info.description: Manages all page layouts in the system, including export and loading.

const.name: CSS_EXPORT_PATH
const.description: Holds the path where the layout css will be exported on release procedure.

method.name: getFilePath
method.description: Get the filepath for the system's layout css path.
method.returndescription: The full system's layout css exported path.

method.name: getFilename
method.description: Get the hashed filename of layout css file

method.name: export
method.description: Exports all system layout styles in one css file at a standard location.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
